songs.title: Forever
songs.lyrics:
(intro)

Ooooh darlin' (x4)

(Verse 1)

Its 4AM beneath the stars under the night,
and you're here, and you're here.

With candles lit the room is dark the moon is light,
we can lay here, we can love here...

(Chorus)

Forever,
is all i ever want,
so be careful,
when you're giving it to someone.

Ooooh darlin' (x2)

(Verse 2)

I bought some food, a change of clothes, a little wine,
and a blanket,
and we used them all...

I dreamt the day away on a planet full of life,
and just stayed there,
i fell in love there.

(Chorus)

Perfect comes near,
perfect just for one,
and forever, is all i ever want,
so be careful,
when you're giving it to someone.

Ooooh darlin' (x2)

We're lying down her cheek is resting on my shoulder,
play with her hair, i adore her.
This is the single sweetest love I've ever known yeah,
we can stay here, run away dear.

(Chorus)

Love knows no fear,
Father doubted some,
forever, is all i ever want,
so be careful,
when you're giving it to someone.

Ooooh darlin' (x2)
